EmailTemplate.subject: A roadmap for maximizing your award
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Informalname__c},
Nice talking to you again. It was extremely helpful to learn more about how we can work together to make the most of your selection as a Five Star award winner.
Based on our discussion and my experience working with professionals like you, I put together recommendations for building on the awareness created by the announcement in the magazine. Please review the proposal and let me know if you have any questions or suggestions.
I’ll call you to follow up and discuss next steps. Thank you for considering the proposal and I look forward to talking to you soon.
See your proposal below:
